author: kfogel
msg: revision 3633 it is no longer used.

author: kfogel
msg: Resolve issue #806, by making wc-property changes during a commit a
deferred loggy operation.  In addition to new changes, this involved
reverting much of revision 2555 and revision 2562.  The changes due to
reversion are listed below along with everything else.  [NOTE: And see
revision 3634 for a crucial typo fix in libsvn_wc/log.c.]
The general plan of this change is: the RA layer now calls
push_wc_prop() (formerly set_wc_prop) to make wcprop changes.  Instead
of writing out the wcprop change immediately, push_wc_prop now buffers
it inside the same svn_client_commit_item_t that will later be used
for post-commit processing.  When svn_client_commit() calls
svn_wc_process_committed(), it passes the buffered wcprop changes
along, thus libsvn_wc is able to ensure that the changes are written
in the appropriate log group for that committed item.
Note that the eventual long-term solution might be to associate
accumulating .svn/log data with svn_wc_adm_access_t batons, then
ensure that the appropriate access baton is available to push_wc_prop,
so that the wcprop change can be grouped directly into the general log
for that item.  That's a much more complex and pervasive change than
this one, however; and in the meantime, some of the groundwork for it
is introduced here, in particular, log actions for writing wcprops.
(svn_ra_callbacks_t): Rename set_prop to push_prop.  All callers
(merge_ctx_t): Call it push_prop, not set_prop.  All callers
(push_wc_prop): Replaces set_wc_prop.  Buffer the prop change to
take effect during the post-commit process, rather than doing it
SVN_WC__LOG_ATTR_PROPVAL): New log action and attributes.
do those changes in the same log as other actions for this item.
(svn_client_commit): Pass the commit item's wcprop_changes along to
svn_wc_process_committed.  Also, refer to issue #960 in an old
(get_delta_base): Remove get_rev parameter, don't validate vsn_url
(custom_get_request): Remove get_rev parameter, don't pass it to
(simple_fetch_file): Remove get_rev parameter, don't pass it to
(fetch_file): Don't pass null placeholder for get_rev to
(svn_ra_dav__get_file): Don't pass a get_rev funct to
(start_element): Don't pass a get_rev function to simple_fetch_file.
(filter_props, end_element): Don't erase the old vsn_url_rev.
(SVN_ERR_BAD_REVISION): Removed, no one uses it now.
